title: T206 Camnitz *Pirates* Arms Down w/Tolstoi Back Gd/Vg
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: T206 Camnitz *Pirates* Arms Down w/Tolstoi Back Gd/Vg
posts.post_content:
Decent looking card with edge wear and rounded corners. One small to med. crease left side border. A couple white marks (or flaking) of surface. Tolstoi back. Would like to sell by end of week to person w/the best offer over $20. Cheers, Pat

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/camnitz.jpg[/IMG][/url]

[IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/camnitztolstoi.jpg[/IMG]

Is that some ghosting on the front, of a piedmont or tolstoi style back, or just an artifact from the scan? Most evident in the upper-right quadrant. Could add to its value for those who seek such oddities.
I guess it's ghosting (appropriate for the Halloween season, eh?) and is not from the scan
It's definitely a wet print transfer.  Happened when the sheets of freshly printed cards were place one on top of the other before they dried.  You get the reverse image of the back on the front.
Looking for a couple more offers, still at low $....
